sentences.sContent: I usually buy all my vegetables at the market.
sentences.sCn: 我通常都是在菜市场里购买蔬菜。

sentences.sContent: There’s a good antiques market here on Sundays.
sentences.sCn: 每逢周日这里都会有一个不错的古玩集市。

sentences.sContent: If you could ever figure out how to market this you’d make a fortune..
sentences.sCn: 如果能想出办法来推销这个东西，你就发财了。

synos.tran: 市场；行情；股票市场；市面；[贸易]集市；销路；商店

phrases.pCn: 股票市场；证券市场；股票交易
房地产市场；不动产市场
地产市场；房地产市场；物业市场
市场机制；市场调节作用

words.tran: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
[贸易] 市场商人；市场营销人员
出售；在市场上进行交易；使…上市（market的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a time when people buy and sell goods, food etc, or the place, usually outside or in a large building, where this happens
to try to persuade people to buy a product by advertising it in a particular way, using attractive packages etc
